About Us

About Us

At AZoom Car Rentals, we're more than just a car rental company. We're committed to providing exceptional customer service, from the moment you book your vehicle to the moment you return it. Our friendly and knowledgeable team is always here to help, so you can focus on making the most of your trip. So why wait? Book your rental car today and start exploring. With AZoom Car Rentals, the road is yours to conquer.

In key ideology behind the team of AZoom Car Rentals is to deliver the best to all car owners. Strong emphasis is placed on to offer only tip top condition tyres to our customers. This involves a combination of process which start from product audits that covers both external and internal checks to quality conformity testing throughout the product lifecycle for ensuring effectiveness and efficiency.

You can have a peace of mind and be assured of performance and also the durability of these tyres.

We embrace the latest technology and knowledge in the tyre installation process. Complete tyre fitting and balancing services will be done using the latest fully automatic tyre changer.

This machine provides fast and precise fitting with zero error. Being a touchless changer, it will not scratch or damage your rims in the process. The whole process will also be managed by our skilful and meticulous technicians to ensure that everything in perfect order.

To serve all our value customers better, we also provide other automotive services such as vehicle servicing, general repairs, engine overhaul, auto transmission overhaul, battery check & replacement, air conditioning servicing & repair and collision damage repair. Be it a basic repair or sophisticated computer diagnostic repair, our advanced diagnostic equipment and highly trained technicians allow us to tackle all of these automotive needs.

For general vehicle servicing, we only use quality synthetic oil that is designed for modern engines. These synthetic oils are made from an advanced refining process in which more impurities are removed. In general, it will keep your engine cleaner, offer greater engine wear protection, flow better in low temperature and protect better at high temperatures. This resulted in more horsepower and better gas mileage.
